data.description: Download and install CPAN modules when used
data.similar:
Acme::AutoINC downloads precompiled modules from an FTP server.
    CPAN::AutoINC downloads and compiles from CPAN.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is dependent upon, and only useful within the context
    of, CPAN and therefore using the CPAN top-level namespace seemed
    appropriate. This module is simply a tool that can invoke the CPAN
    installer when appropriate, based on the modules used by a given
    script.
